docs.title: flythereddflagg.github.io
docs.text: I am Mark Edward Redd. Below are links to information about some of the projects I am working on.

docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
1. Mark Redd's CV: A website showing my CV
  2. The Redd Python Book: A free book to teach beginners about Python and introductory computer science
  3. The Python and C implementations of the Leapfrogging Optimization Algorithm published by Dr. R. Russell Rhinehart
  4. Alpha pre-release versions of Red Castle Avenger are available. Play test the game now!
  5. Release versions of Exp Check are available for download!
  6. More projects TBA!
